QuestData.Title: Hot On the Trail: Murlocs
QuestData.Description: As pointless as I think that this is going to be, we need to investigate all of our leads.$B$BI need you to head out to the Longshore, west of here, on the coast, and shake up some murlocs. Try to find a clue or some info that can help shed some light on the murders.$B$BReturn to me if you get lucky, rookie.
QuestData.RewardText: Nice find, rookie. I think I have a stack of these on my desk back at the station. We're basically back to square one. What do we know? Someone that likes to write fiction about the past sent the Furlbrows a letter.$B$BLooks like we got ourselves a real history... mystery.
